description:
After observing the outcome of the U.S. election, high-level officials in the Chinese Communist Party acted quickly: Xi Jinping's (习近平) highly trusted ally in the military, Miao Hua (苗华), head of the Central Military Commission’s Political Work Department, has reportedly been arrested. What signal does this alleged downfall of such a high-ranking figure send?

Our videos are hosted by real people with real China experience and access to real insights happening in China today. No bots here!

title: Key Xi Jinping Ally Admiral Miao Hua Reportedly Detained
